high_descs: Take  step to your left and head to the desk in front of you
Pick up the clear square bowl that is on the left.
Take a step to the left and stand in front of the table that is to the left of the desk; the one with the lamp
Turn on the lamp that is sitting on the table
anns.task_desc: Examine a bowl under a lamp

high_descs: Turn left and take two steps then turn right and walk to the middle of the two desks.
Pick up the clear bowl that's nearest to you.
Turn around and take a step then turn right and take a step then turn right and take a step.
Turn on the lamp that's on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Inspect a bowl by lamp light.

high_descs: Walk to the plastic bowls on the left side of the desk in front of you.
Pick up the plastic bowl on the left.
Walk slightly to the left and stand in front of the lamp on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a plastic bowl by the light of a desk lamp.
